translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I have received the office of Your Lordship Electoral Board.

To be in agreement and for nothing to be lacking on the 8th (as is my wish) I beg Your Lordship Your Lordship Tax Office. The response of Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship São Lourenço, February 26, 1840. Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. General Chief of Police. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. President of the Primary Assembly.

Office of Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu, President of the Primary Assembly, of February 26, received on the 28th and answered on the same day. Presidency Secretariat of the Republic To citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Chief of Police of Boqueirão. From citizen Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. Election of the Constituent Assembly.

To citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Chief of Police of Boqueirão. From citizen Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. Election of the Constituent Assembly.
